data.title: Grapeline Experience - Wine Tour in Tenerife
data.meta_description: One of the best and most interesting ways to discover Tenerife is through its fabulous foods and wines! 2 wine tastings & lunch included
data.text:
Here is what's in store for you

Get ready to visit places where you can taste and discover the Canaries through its fabulous food and wines with this Tenerife wine tour!

The first stop of your tour will be the World Heritage City of La Laguna with its fascinating architecture.

Next, you will visit El Sauzal and the Wine Museum Casa del Vino, where you will have the opportunity to taste different kinds of cheese and dates accompanied by samples of two glorious local wines. This tasting takes place in a themed room and will allow you to get to know the history of the wines of Tenerife and their importance, and learn some interesting facts about the insular wine sector. The tasting takes place in the old cellar for red wines from the Hacienda.

You will then move on to your second winery, Bodega Monje, with its stunning views of the Tacoronte Valley and the North Ocean. Here you will enjoy a four-course Canarian lunch in the winery's picturesque ocean-view restaurant. You will also have a chance to sample a different wine with every course.

This excursion gives you a chance to discover some of the most stunning views of the North of the Island. Donâ€™t forget your cameras!
